body_html:
I'd guess the issue is -Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX, which AFAIK isn't part of the standard build. Probably easiest to run the build on a GCE VM (@gunan or @yifeif might have a canonical configuration script) using the following script:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/cpu/cmake/run_build.bat

...although you'll need to modify the CMake invocation with the additional AVX flag.

...although you'll need to modify the CMake invocation with the additional AVX flag.
body:
I'd guess the issue is `-Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX`, which AFAIK isn't part of the standard build. Probably easiest to run the build on a GCE VM (@gunan or @yifeif might have a canonical configuration script) using the following script:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/cpu/cmake/run_build.bat

...although you'll need to modify the CMake invocation with the additional AVX flag.
